CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name, "IO Initial", "Pre-Approval", "IO Initial - Approved", "Approved", "IO Renewal", "Pre-Approval", "IO Renewal - Approved", "Approved", "IO Upsell", "Pre-Approval", "IO Upsell - Approved", "Approved", "MSA Initial", "Pre-Approval", "MSA Initial - Approved", "Approved", "MSA Renewal", "Pre-Approval", "MSA Renewal - Approved", "Approved", "MSA Upsell", "Pre-Approval", "Approved" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is an automatically generated field using the Record Type and used in the Dynamic Naming of the Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Approval Status
